laws.summary: EARNED PAID SICK TIME REQUIRED (effective May 1, 2025)
requirements: EARNED PAID SICK TIME REQUIRED (effective May 1, 2025)
Employers with 15+ employees must provide earned paid sick time. 1 hour per 30 hours worked. Can accrue up to 56 hours per year (15+ employees) or 40 hours (fewer than 15 employees).
Action required: Implement earned sick time policy by May 1, 2025
Provide 1 hour per 30 hours worked (effective May 1, 2025)
